brooklyn.entity.rebind.persister
[Java] Class MementoFileWriterSync

java.lang.Object
  brooklyn.entity.rebind.persister.MementoFileWriterSync

public class MementoFileWriterSync

For synchronously writing to a file - all calls block. This class is thread-safe. If a write/delete/append is in progress, then subsequent calls will block.

aled
